snippet.title: Acryptia Gameplay: Slaying Monsters
snippet.description:
Acryptia is a PvE desktop game playable on browser. It is a skill-based dungeon card game in which players have to beat Rug'O, the card card dealer, to advance to new levels, climb the leaderboard, and win prizes through Season Rewards.

Acryptia release is set for November 15th - when the first Venue reaches Level ⭐ 1 🔼100 - and will start with Season 1.

When in the HAND slots Shields & Weapons can be used to interact with Monsters:
Drag Monsters against equipped Shields 🛡
Drag equipped Weapons against Monsters ⚔️
